__e: We offered him... other alternatives, we did everything we could think of, Jack.
And if something bad might happen, I'd like to know what our options are.
I know, sir, but what's the alternative?
Well, I did figure out how.
And told her she should talk to her parents.
I should have taken her out of here the moment I heard the stories, but... there were so few options and I swear I never thought she'd...
